feed.title: Jetlog Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Timezone support by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/89
  • Bump version 1.1.2, update images by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/86
  • Allow specifying a BASE_URL for Jetlog by @SaswatPadhi in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/72
  • Add Support for Authentication via HTTP Headers by @ClumsyAdmin in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/87
  • Update docker CI to handle releases, pull requests by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/90

Note: with the new timezone support, newly created flights will use timezones by default to calculate duration. If you wish to disable this, you can do so in the settings

New Contributors

  • @SaswatPadhi made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/72

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.2-fix
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release is a simple fix to a breaking bug that was present in 1.1.2. Apologies for the confusion.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.2-fix

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ðŸŽ‰ Add Flighty CSV import, use tini for cleaner shutdowns, various fixes by @ClumsyAdmin in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/94
  • ðŸŽ‰ Support for connection flights by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/97
  • ðŸŽ‰ Implement ability to compute & display visited countries by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/111
  • Make AUTH_HEADER optional by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/91
  • Fix: Create valid tag on pull requests by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/95
  • Force public npm registry on Docker build by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/98
  • Prioritize shorter names in airport/airline queries by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/96
  • Add curl to runtime docker build by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/102
  • Fix editing tail number, import flight number from FR24 CSV by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/103
  • Remove geo markers API (use lines instead), implement rendering single flight trajectories by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/109
  • Statistics and Insights #107 by @Floo33R in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/108
  • WorldMap fix when user has no flights by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/110
  • Ability to bulk compute connections; avoid importing/exporting flight connections by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/112

Note: you can automatically set the connectionÂ field for all of your previous flights by going to Settings > Compute flight connections

New Contributors

  • @Floo33R made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/108

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Various improvements to maps by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add ipv6 support by @vladwing in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/117
  • (fix) Allow updating flight's airline by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/120
  • New job to fetch airlines for all flights with a callsign but no airline by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/119
  • Statistics about # of visited countries and most common airport countries by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/121

You can now choose to use IPV6 by setting the environment variable USE_IPV6 to true

New Contributors

  • @vladwing made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.1.4...v1.1.5
